entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening then changing to rain showers before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
